comments: Strictly lectures but very interesting if majoring in psychology. No homework, quizzes, projects, or midterm. Only tests. 4 mandatory and final exam optional. Every test you can get 5 points extra credit by writing a paper and you 10 for participating in a research study. Study guides helped!!! All power points on blackboard so don\'t buy the book.

comments: Class is lecture with a couple of movies that depict specific psychological conditions. Dr. Markowitz is clear, and encyclopedic in her knowledge of the subject. Although books aren\'t necessary in class, you would be well advised to read ahead in the text, which will give context during lecture. Tests are not difficult if you\'ve done your homework.

comments: Amazing teacher. SHOW UP. There are 5 exams... she drops the lowest one. Each exam has 50 multiple choice questions, 5 short essays (You do 5, you choose from 10). She hands out study guides, and stuff on the study guides are even prompts for the short essays, which is why you needa show up. Take her... you won\'t regret it.
